Label: Total Devices
Comment: ‘Total devices’ represent publicly available charging devices at all speeds.

Label: Total Devices per 100,000 Population
Comment: ‘Total devices’ represent publicly available charging devices at all speeds.

Label: Rapid Devices
Comment: ‘Rapid devices’ are those whose fastest connector is rated at 43kW and above.
